title: Display type with several angled stroke ends
content: It looks very close to a modified version of [Handel Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826194442/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/handel-gothic/ef-bold/testdrive.html?s=COMMUNICATIONS&p=48), but the uppercase 'E', 'F' and 'L' are not curved like in Handel.
author: Grant Hutchinson
